### GRAMMATICAL CASE | ПАДЕЖИ ###
## GENITIVE | РОДИТЕЛЬНЫЙ ##
RU_CL_RP = {
	type = country
	log_loc_errors = no
	
	text = {
		trigger = {
			exists = c:FRA
			this = c:FRA
			has_law = law_type:law_monarchy
			ruler = { has_variable = is_bonapartist }
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_RP_dyn_c_french_empire # genitive
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				AND = {
					exists = c:HOL
					this = c:HOL
					c:HOL = {			
						owns_entire_state_region = STATE_SCHLESWIG_HOLSTEIN
					}
				}
				AND = {
					exists = c:SCH
					this = c:SCH
					c:SCH = {			
						owns_entire_state_region = STATE_SCHLESWIG_HOLSTEIN
					}
				}
			}
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_RP_dyn_c_schleswig_holstein # genitive
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			exists = c:MAD
			this = c:MAD
			c:MAD = {			
				coa_monarchy_trigger = yes
				is_country_type = unrecognized
			}
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_RP_dyn_c_merina_kingdom # genitive
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			exists = c:WLS
			this = c:WLS
			c:WLS = {			
				capital = { state_region = s:STATE_PATAGONIA }
			}
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_RP_dyn_c_welsh_patagonia # genitive
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			exists = c:USA
			this = c:USA
			c:USA = {			
				any_scope_state = {
					state_region = { has_variable = district_of_columbia }
					count > 0
				}
				any_scope_state = {
					state_region = { NOT = { has_variable = district_of_columbia } }
					count < 1
				}			
			}
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_RP_dyn_c_united_senators # genitive
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			exists = c:USA
			this = c:USA
			c:USA = {		
				any_scope_state = {
					state_region = { NOT = { has_variable = district_of_columbia } }
					count = 1
				}
			}
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_RP_dyn_c_united_states # genitive
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			exists = c:USA
			this = c:USA
			coa_communist_trigger = yes
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_RP_dyn_c_united_syndicates_of_america # genitive
	}
	text = {

			exists = c:USA

			}

## DATIVE | ДАТЕЛЬНЫЙ ##
RU_CL_DP = {
	type = country
	log_loc_errors = no

	text = {
		trigger = {
			exists = c:FRA
			this = c:FRA
			has_law = law_type:law_monarchy
			ruler = { has_variable = is_bonapartist }
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_DP_dyn_c_french_empire # dative
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				AND = {
					exists = c:HOL
					this = c:HOL
					c:HOL = {			
						owns_entire_state_region = STATE_SCHLESWIG_HOLSTEIN
					}
				}
				AND = {
					exists = c:SCH
					this = c:SCH
					c:SCH = {			
						owns_entire_state_region = STATE_SCHLESWIG_HOLSTEIN
					}
				}
			}
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_DP_dyn_c_schleswig_holstein # dative
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			exists = c:MAD
			this = c:MAD
			c:MAD = {			
				coa_monarchy_trigger = yes
				is_country_type = unrecognized
			}
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_DP_dyn_c_merina_kingdom # dative
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			exists = c:WLS
			this = c:WLS
			c:WLS = {			
				capital = { state_region = s:STATE_PATAGONIA }
			}
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_DP_dyn_c_welsh_patagonia # dative
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			exists = c:USA
			this = c:USA
			c:USA = {			
				any_scope_state = {
					state_region = { has_variable = district_of_columbia }
					count > 0
				}
				any_scope_state = {
					state_region = { NOT = { has_variable = district_of_columbia } }
					count < 1
				}			
			}
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_DP_dyn_c_united_senators # dative
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			exists = c:USA
			this = c:USA
			c:USA = {		
				any_scope_state = {
					state_region = { NOT = { has_variable = district_of_columbia } }
					count = 1
				}
			}
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_DP_dyn_c_united_states # dative
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			exists = c:USA
			this = c:USA
			coa_communist_trigger = yes
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_DP_dyn_c_united_syndicates_of_america # dative
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			exists = c:USA
			this = c:USA
			coa_theocracy_trigger = yes
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_DP_dyn_c_united_synods_of_america # dative
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			exists = c:TUR
			this = c:TUR
			coa_monarchy_trigger = yes
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_DP_dyn_c_ottoman_empire # dative
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			exists = c:PAP

			coa_theocracy_trigger = yes
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_DP_dyn_c_papal_states # dative

	text = {

			exists = c:PAP

			coa_republic_trigger = yes
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_DP_dyn_c_roman_republic # dative
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			exists = c:ONT
			this = c:ONT
			exists = c:GBR
			c:GBR = {
				has_diplomatic_pact = {
					who = c:ONT
					type = puppet
					is_initiator = yes
				}
			}
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_DP_dyn_c_upper_canada # dative
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			exists = c:QUE
			this = c:QUE
			exists = c:GBR
			c:GBR = {
				has_diplomatic_pact = {
					who = c:QUE
					type = puppet
					is_initiator = yes
				}
			}
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_DP_dyn_c_lower_canada # dative
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			exists = c:CLM
			this = c:CLM
			coa_republic_trigger = yes

## ACCUSATIVE | ВИНИТЕЛЬНЫЙ ##
RU_CL_VP = {
	type = country
	log_loc_errors = no
	
	text = {
		trigger = {
			exists = c:FRA
			this = c:FRA
			has_law = law_type:law_monarchy
			ruler = { has_variable = is_bonapartist }
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_VP_dyn_c_french_empire # accusative
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				AND = {
					exists = c:HOL
					this = c:HOL
					c:HOL = {			
						owns_entire_state_region = STATE_SCHLESWIG_HOLSTEIN
					}
				}
				AND = {
					exists = c:SCH
					this = c:SCH
					c:SCH = {			
						owns_entire_state_region = STATE_SCHLESWIG_HOLSTEIN
					}
				}
			}
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_VP_dyn_c_schleswig_holstein # accusative
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			exists = c:MAD
			this = c:MAD
			c:MAD = {			
				coa_monarchy_trigger = yes
				is_country_type = unrecognized
			}
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_VP_dyn_c_merina_kingdom # accusative
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			exists = c:WLS
			this = c:WLS
			c:WLS = {			
				capital = { state_region = s:STATE_PATAGONIA }
			}
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_VP_dyn_c_welsh_patagonia # accusative
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			exists = c:USA
			this = c:USA
			c:USA = {			
				any_scope_state = {
					state_region = { has_variable = district_of_columbia }
					count > 0
				}
				any_scope_state = {
					state_region = { NOT = { has_variable = district_of_columbia } }
					count < 1
				}			
			}
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_VP_dyn_c_united_senators # accusative
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			exists = c:USA
			this = c:USA
			c:USA = {		
				any_scope_state = {
					state_region = { NOT = { has_variable = district_of_columbia } }
					count = 1
				}
			}
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_VP_dyn_c_united_states # accusative
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			exists = c:USA
			this = c:USA
			coa_communist_trigger = yes
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_VP_dyn_c_united_syndicates_of_america # accusative
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			exists = c:USA
			this = c:USA

## INSTRUMENTAL | ТВОРИТЕЛЬНЫЙ ##
RU_CL_TP = {
	type = country
	log_loc_errors = no
	
	text = {
		trigger = {
			exists = c:FRA
			this = c:FRA
			has_law = law_type:law_monarchy
			ruler = { has_variable = is_bonapartist }
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_TP_dyn_c_french_empire # instrumental
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				AND = {
					exists = c:HOL
					this = c:HOL
					c:HOL = {			
						owns_entire_state_region = STATE_SCHLESWIG_HOLSTEIN
					}
				}
				AND = {
					exists = c:SCH
					this = c:SCH
					c:SCH = {			
						owns_entire_state_region = STATE_SCHLESWIG_HOLSTEIN
					}
				}
			}
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_TP_dyn_c_schleswig_holstein # instrumental
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			exists = c:MAD
			this = c:MAD
			c:MAD = {			
				coa_monarchy_trigger = yes
				is_country_type = unrecognized
			}
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_TP_dyn_c_merina_kingdom # instrumental
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			exists = c:WLS
			this = c:WLS
			c:WLS = {			
				capital = { state_region = s:STATE_PATAGONIA }
			}
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_TP_dyn_c_welsh_patagonia # instrumental
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			exists = c:USA
			this = c:USA
			c:USA = {			
				any_scope_state = {
					state_region = { has_variable = district_of_columbia }
					count > 0
				}
				any_scope_state = {
					state_region = { NOT = { has_variable = district_of_columbia } }
					count < 1
				}			
			}
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_TP_dyn_c_united_senators # instrumental
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			exists = c:USA
			this = c:USA
			c:USA = {		
				any_scope_state = {
					state_region = { NOT = { has_variable = district_of_columbia } }
					count = 1
				}
			}
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_TP_dyn_c_united_states # instrumental
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			exists = c:USA
			this = c:USA
			coa_communist_trigger = yes
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_TP_dyn_c_united_syndicates_of_america # instrumental

## PREPOSITIONAL | ПРЕДЛОЖНЫЙ ##
RU_CL_PP = {
	type = country
	log_loc_errors = no
	
	text = {
		trigger = {
			exists = c:FRA
			this = c:FRA
			has_law = law_type:law_monarchy
			ruler = { has_variable = is_bonapartist }
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_PP_dyn_c_french_empire # prepositional
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				AND = {
					exists = c:HOL
					this = c:HOL
					c:HOL = {			
						owns_entire_state_region = STATE_SCHLESWIG_HOLSTEIN
					}
				}
				AND = {
					exists = c:SCH
					this = c:SCH
					c:SCH = {			
						owns_entire_state_region = STATE_SCHLESWIG_HOLSTEIN
					}
				}
			}
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_PP_dyn_c_schleswig_holstein # prepositional
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			exists = c:MAD
			this = c:MAD
			c:MAD = {			
				coa_monarchy_trigger = yes
				is_country_type = unrecognized
			}
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_PP_dyn_c_merina_kingdom # prepositional
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			exists = c:WLS
			this = c:WLS
			c:WLS = {			
				capital = { state_region = s:STATE_PATAGONIA }
			}
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_PP_dyn_c_welsh_patagonia # prepositional
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			exists = c:USA
			this = c:USA
			c:USA = {			
				any_scope_state = {
					state_region = { has_variable = district_of_columbia }
					count > 0
				}
				any_scope_state = {
					state_region = { NOT = { has_variable = district_of_columbia } }
					count < 1
				}			
			}
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_PP_dyn_c_united_senators # prepositional
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			exists = c:USA
			this = c:USA
			c:USA = {		
				any_scope_state = {
					state_region = { NOT = { has_variable = district_of_columbia } }
					count = 1
				}
			}
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_PP_dyn_c_united_states # prepositional
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			exists = c:USA
			this = c:USA
			coa_communist_trigger = yes
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_PP_dyn_c_united_syndicates_of_america # prepositional
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			exists = c:USA
			this = c:USA
			coa_theocracy_trigger = yes
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_PP_dyn_c_united_synods_of_america # prepositional
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			exists = c:TUR
			this = c:TUR
			coa_monarchy_trigger = yes
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_PP_dyn_c_ottoman_empire # prepositional
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			exists = c:PAP
			this = c:PAP
			coa_theocracy_trigger = yes
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_PP_dyn_c_papal_states # prepositional
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			exists = c:PAP
			this = c:PAP
			coa_republic_trigger = yes
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_PP_dyn_c_roman_republic # prepositional
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			exists = c:ONT
			this = c:ONT
			exists = c:GBR
			c:GBR = {
				has_diplomatic_pact = {
					who = c:ONT
					type = puppet
					is_initiator = yes
				}
			}
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_PP_dyn_c_upper_canada # prepositional
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			exists = c:QUE
			this = c:QUE
			exists = c:GBR
			c:GBR = {
				has_diplomatic_pact = {
					who = c:QUE
					type = puppet
					is_initiator = yes
				}
			}
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_PP_dyn_c_lower_canada # prepositional
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			exists = c:CLM
			this = c:CLM
			coa_republic_trigger = yes
			c:CLM = {
				OR = {
					has_law = law_type:law_legacy_slavery
					has_law = law_type:law_slave_trade
				}
			}
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_PP_dyn_c_new_granada # prepositional
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			AND = {
				exists = c:USA
				this = c:USA
				coa_monarchy_trigger = yes
			}
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_PP_dyn_c_united_sovereign_archduchy # prepositional
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			exists = c:RUS
			this = c:RUS
			coa_communist_trigger = yes
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_PP_dyn_c_soviet_union # prepositional
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			exists = c:MEX
			this = c:MEX
			coa_monarchy_trigger = yes
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_PP_dyn_c_mexican_empire # prepositional
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			exists = c:USA
			this = c:USA
			coa_monarchy_trigger = yes
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_PP_dyn_c_confederated_sovereigns_of_america # prepositional
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			exists = c:CSA
			this = c:CSA

		localization_key = RU_CL_PP_dyn_c_communist_states_of_america # prepositional

			exists = c:USA
			this = c:USA
			coa_theocracy_trigger = yes
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_PP_dyn_c_confederate_synods_of_america # prepositional
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			exists = c:CHI
			this = c:CHI
			c:CHI = { country_has_primary_culture = cu:manchu }
			coa_monarchy_trigger = yes
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_PP_dyn_c_great_qing # prepositional
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			exists = c:BAV

		trigger = {
			exists = c:BRE
			this = c:BRE

### CULTURE | КУЛЬТУРЫ ###
## ADJECTIVE | ПРИЛАГАТЕЛЬНЫЕ КУЛЬТУР ##

### RELIGION | РЕЛИГИИ ###
## ADJECTIVE | ПРИЛАГАТЕЛЬНЫЕ ##
# Православные/Суннитские/Галугпские #
RU_RL_ADJ_IE = {
	type = religion
	log_loc_errors = no

	text = {  
		trigger = {
			this = rel:animist
		}
		localization_key = RU_RL_ADJ_IE_animist
	}
	text = {  
		trigger = {
			this = rel:catholic
		}
		localization_key = RU_RL_ADJ_IE_catholic

		}

## RELIGION CASE | ПАДЕЖИ РЕЛИГИЙ ##
# Православия/Суннизма/Гелугпского буддизма #
RU_RL_RP = {
	type = religion
	log_loc_errors = no

	text = {  
		trigger = {
			this = rel:animist
		}
		localization_key = RU_RL_RP_animist
	}
	text = {  
		trigger = {
			this = rel:catholic
		}
		localization_key = RU_RL_RP_catholic
	}
	text = {  
		trigger = {
			this = rel:oriental_orthodox
		}
		localization_key = RU_RL_RP_oriental_orthodox
	}
	text = {  
		trigger = {
			this = rel:gelugpa
		}
		localization_key = RU_RL_RP_gelugpa
	}
	text = {  
		trigger = {
			this = rel:hindu
		}
		localization_key = RU_RL_RP_hindu
	}
	text = {  
		trigger = {
			this = rel:jewish
		}
		localization_key = RU_RL_RP_jewish
	}
	text = {  
		trigger = {
			this = rel:mahayana
		}
		localization_key = RU_RL_RP_mahayana
	}
	text = {  
		trigger = {
			this = rel:orthodox
		}
		localization_key = RU_RL_RP_orthodox
	}
	text = {  
		trigger = {
			this = rel:protestant
		}
		localization_key = RU_RL_RP_protestant
	}
	text = {  
		trigger = {
			this = rel:shiite
		}
		localization_key = RU_RL_RP_shiite
	}
	text = {  
		trigger = {
			this = rel:shinto
		}
		localization_key = RU_RL_RP_shinto

### COUNTRIES | СТРАНЫ ###
RU_CL_END = {
	type = country
	log_loc_errors = no

	text = { # -ая
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				AND = {
					exists = c:ABS
					OR = {
						this = c:ABS
						any_diplomatic_play = {
							initiator = root
							target = c:ABS
							OR = {
								is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_revolution
								is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_secession
							}
						}
					}
				}
				AND = {
					exists = c:MAH
					OR = {
						this = c:MAH
						any_diplomatic_play = {
							initiator = root
							target = c:MAH
							OR = {
								is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_revolution
								is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_secession
							}
						}
					}
				}
				AND = {
					exists = c:JMB
					OR = {
						this = c:JMB
						any_diplomatic_play = {
							initiator = root
							target = c:JMB
							OR = {
								is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_revolution
								is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_secession
							}
						}
					}
				}
				AND = {
					exists = c:YOG
					OR = {
						this = c:YOG
						any_diplomatic_play = {
						initiator = root
						target = c:YOG
						c:YOG = { NOT = { owns_entire_state_region = STATE_CENTRAL_JAVA } }
						OR = {
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_revolution
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_secession
						}
					}
					}
				}
				AND = {
					exists = c:SRK
					OR = {
						this = c:SRK
						any_diplomatic_play = {
						initiator = root
						target = c:SRK
						c:SRK = { NOT = { owns_entire_state_region = STATE_CENTRAL_JAVA } }
						OR = {
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_revolution
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_secession
						}
					}
					}
				}
				AND = {
					exists = c:NVS
					OR = {
						this = c:NVS
						any_diplomatic_play = {
							initiator = root
							target = c:NVS
							OR = {
								is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_revolution
								is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_secession
							}
						}
					}
				}
				AND = {
					exists = c:CHC
					OR = {
						this = c:CHC
						any_diplomatic_play = {
						initiator = root
						target = c:CHC
						c:CHC = { NOT = { coa_theocracy_trigger = yes } }
						OR = {
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_revolution
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_secession
						}
					}
					}
				}
				AND = {

							NAND = {
									AND = {
										exists = c:BEL
										root = c:BEL
									}
								coa_republic_trigger = yes

						any_diplomatic_play = {

								count < 1
							}

										count > 0

						}

						}

								exists = c:USA

									}

							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_secession

					}

					AND = {

						this = c:SUD
						has_law = law_type:law_monarchy
					}
					any_diplomatic_play = {
						initiator = root
						target = {
							AND = {
								exists = c:SUD
								this = c:SUD
								has_law = law_type:law_monarchy
							}
						}
						OR = {
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_revolution
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_secession
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_IY # -ий Мекленбург/Египет

							is_capital = yes
							region = sr:region_north_africa
						}
					}
					any_diplomatic_play = {
						initiator = root
						target = {
							AND = {
								exists = c:AFS
								this = c:AFS
								any_state = {
									owner = c:AFS
									is_capital = yes
									region = sr:region_north_africa
								}
							}
						}
						OR = {
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_revolution
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_secession
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					AND = {
						exists = c:ITA
						this = c:ITA
						has_law = law_type:law_theocracy
						NOT = { exists = c:PAP }
					}
					any_diplomatic_play = {
						initiator = root
						target = {
							AND = {
								exists = c:ITA
								this = c:ITA
								has_law = law_type:law_theocracy
								NOT = { exists = c:PAP }
							}
						}
						OR = {
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_revolution
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_secession
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					AND = {
						exists = c:SWE
						this = c:SWE
						is_revolutionary = yes
						capital = { state_region = s:STATE_GOTLAND }
					}
					any_diplomatic_play = {
						initiator = root
						target = {
							AND = {
								exists = c:SWE
								this = c:SWE
								is_revolutionary = yes
								capital = { state_region = s:STATE_GOTLAND }
							}
						}
						OR = {
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_revolution
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_secession
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					AND = {
						exists = c:LAN
						this = c:LAN
						owns_entire_state_region = STATE_WEST_BORNEO
						owns_entire_state_region = STATE_EAST_BORNEO
						owns_entire_state_region = STATE_NORTH_BORNEO
					}
					any_diplomatic_play = {
						initiator = root
						target = {
							AND = {
								exists = c:LAN
								this = c:LAN
								owns_entire_state_region = STATE_WEST_BORNEO
								owns_entire_state_region = STATE_EAST_BORNEO
								owns_entire_state_region = STATE_NORTH_BORNEO
							}
						}
						OR = {
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_revolution
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_secession
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					AND = {
						exists = c:SUD
						this = c:SUD
						has_law = law_type:law_theocracy
					}
					any_diplomatic_play = {
						initiator = root
						target = {
							AND = {
								exists = c:SUD
								this = c:SUD
								has_law = law_type:law_theocracy
							}
						}
						OR = {
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_revolution
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_secession
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					AND = {
						exists = c:LOU
						this = c:LOU
						coa_monarchy_trigger = yes
					}
					any_diplomatic_play = {
						initiator = root
						target = {
							AND = {
								exists = c:LOU
								this = c:LOU
								coa_monarchy_trigger = yes
							}
						}
						OR = {
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_revolution
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_secession
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					AND = {
						exists = c:LOU
						this = c:LOU
						coa_theocracy_trigger = yes
					}
					any_diplomatic_play = {
						initiator = root
						target = {
							AND = {
								exists = c:LOU
								this = c:LOU
								coa_theocracy_trigger = yes
							}
						}
						OR = {
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_revolution
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_secession
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					AND = {
						exists = c:MAD
						this = c:MAD
						coa_monarchy_trigger = yes
						is_country_type = unrecognized
					}
					any_diplomatic_play = {
						initiator = root
						target = {
							AND = {
								exists = c:MAD
								this = c:MAD
								coa_monarchy_trigger = yes
							}
						}
						OR = {
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_revolution
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_secession
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_OE # -ое Рио-Гранде/Всевеликое Войско Донское
	}
	text = {
		localization_key = RU_CL_DEFAULT # -ая страна
	}
}

							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_revolution
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_secession
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					AND = {
						exists = c:CHI
						this = c:CHI
						NOT = { country_has_primary_culture = cu:manchu }
						has_law = law_type:law_monarchy
					}
					any_diplomatic_play = {
						initiator = root
						target = {
							AND = {
								exists = c:CHI
								this = c:CHI
								NOT = { country_has_primary_culture = cu:manchu }
								has_law = law_type:law_monarchy
							}
						}
						OR = {
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_revolution
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_secession
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					AND = {
						exists = c:GBR
						this = c:GBR
						coa_communist_trigger = yes
						exists = capital
						capital = { state_region = s:STATE_LANCASHIRE } 
					}
					any_diplomatic_play = {
						initiator = root
						target = {
							AND = {
								exists = c:GBR
								this = c:GBR
								coa_communist_trigger = yes
								exists = capital
								capital = { state_region = s:STATE_LANCASHIRE } 
							}
						}
						OR = {
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_revolution
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_secession
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					AND = {
						exists = c:IDN
						this = c:IDN
						has_law = law_type:law_monarchy
						ruler = {
							OR = {
								has_culture = cu:malay
								has_culture = cu:sumatran
							}
						}
					}
					any_diplomatic_play = {
						initiator = root
						target = {
							AND = {
								exists = c:IDN
								this = c:IDN
								has_law = law_type:law_monarchy
								ruler = {
									OR = {
										has_culture = cu:malay

									}
								}
							}
						}
						OR = {
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_revolution
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_secession
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					AND = {
						exists = c:SAF
						this = c:SAF
						exists = c:GBR
						c:GBR = {
							has_diplomatic_pact = {
								who = c:SAF
								type = puppet
								is_initiator = yes
							}
						}

					any_diplomatic_play = {

						target = {

								exists = c:SAF
								this = c:SAF
								exists = c:GBR

									}

							}
						}
						OR = {
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_revolution
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_secession

						coa_republic_trigger = yes
						NOT = { coa_communist_trigger = yes }
					}

							}
						}

					}
					any_diplomatic_play = {
						initiator = root
						target = {
							AND = {
								exists = c:LOU
								this = c:LOU

							}
						}

							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_revolution
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_secession
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					AND = {
						exists = c:CSA
						this = c:CSA
						coa_monarchy_trigger = yes
					}
					any_diplomatic_play = {
						initiator = root
						target = {
							AND = {
								exists = c:CSA
								this = c:CSA
								coa_monarchy_trigger = yes
							}
						}
						OR = {
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_revolution
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_secession
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					AND = {
						exists = c:CSA
						this = c:CSA
						coa_communist_trigger = yes
					}
					any_diplomatic_play = {
						initiator = root
						target = {
							AND = {
								exists = c:CSA
								this = c:CSA
								coa_communist_trigger = yes
							}
						}
						OR = {
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_revolution
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_secession
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					AND = {
						exists = c:USA
						this = c:USA
						coa_theocracy_trigger = yes
					}
					any_diplomatic_play = {
						initiator = root
						target = {
							AND = {
								exists = c:USA
								this = c:USA
								coa_theocracy_trigger = yes
							}
						}
						OR = {
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_revolution
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_secession
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					AND = {
						exists = c:NET
						this = c:NET
						c:NET = { 
							owns_entire_state_region = STATE_FLANDERS
							owns_entire_state_region = STATE_WALLONIA
						}
					}
					any_diplomatic_play = {
						initiator = root
						target = {
							AND = {
								exists = c:NET
								this = c:NET
								c:NET = { 
									owns_entire_state_region = STATE_FLANDERS
									owns_entire_state_region = STATE_WALLONIA
								}
							}
						}
						OR = {
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_revolution
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_secession
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					AND = {
						exists = c:BEL
						this = c:BEL
						coa_republic_trigger = yes
						NOT = { coa_communist_trigger = yes }
					}
					any_diplomatic_play = {
						initiator = root
						target = {
							AND = {
								exists = c:BEL
								this = c:BEL
								coa_republic_trigger = yes
								NOT = { coa_communist_trigger = yes }
							}
						}
						OR = {
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_revolution
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_secession
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					AND = {
						exists = c:USA
						this = c:USA
						NOT = {
							c:USA = {		
								any_scope_state = {
									state_region = { NOT = { has_variable = district_of_columbia } }
									count = 1
								}
							}
						}
					}
					any_diplomatic_play = {
						initiator = root
						target = c:USA
						NOT = {
							c:USA = {		
								any_scope_state = {
									state_region = { NOT = { has_variable = district_of_columbia } }
									count = 1
								}
							}
						}
						OR = {
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_revolution
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_secession
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					AND = {
						exists = c:PHI
						this = c:PHI
						exists = c:SPA
						c:SPA = {
							has_diplomatic_pact = {
								who = c:PHI
								type = puppet
								is_initiator = yes
							}
						}
					}
					any_diplomatic_play = {
						initiator = root
						target = {
							AND = {
								exists = c:PHI
								this = c:PHI
								exists = c:SPA
								c:SPA = {
									has_diplomatic_pact = {
										who = c:PHI
										type = puppet
										is_initiator = yes
									}
								}
							}
						}
						OR = {
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_revolution
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_secession
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}

		localization_key = RU_CL_END_FEM_DEFAULT # -и
	}

RU_CL_END_T = {
	type = country
	log_loc_errors = no

	text = { # -ет
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				AND = {
					exists = c:ABS
					OR = {
						this = c:ABS
						any_diplomatic_play = {
							initiator = root
							target = c:ABS
							OR = {
								is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_revolution
								is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_secession
							}
						}
					}
				}
				AND = {
					exists = c:MAH
					OR = {
						this = c:MAH
						any_diplomatic_play = {
							initiator = root
							target = c:MAH
							OR = {
								is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_revolution
								is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_secession
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					AND = {
						exists = c:MAD

						coa_monarchy_trigger = yes

				AND = {
					exists = c:GBR
					OR = {
						this = c:GBR
						any_diplomatic_play = {
						initiator = root
						target = c:GBR
						NOR = {
							c:GBR = {
								NOT = { has_law = law_type:law_council_republic }
								exists = capital
								capital = { state_region = s:STATE_LANCASHIRE }
							}
							c:GBR = { coa_dictatorship_trigger = yes }
						}
						OR = {
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_revolution
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_secession
						}
					}
					}
				}

								this = c:MOL
								coa_monarchy_trigger = no
							}
						}
						OR = {
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_revolution
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_secession
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					AND = {
						exists = c:COM
						this = c:COM
						NOT = { is_country_type = decentralized } # if Comanche is recognized, then they get a more formal name
					}
					any_diplomatic_play = {
						initiator = root
						target = {
							AND = {
								exists = c:COM
								this = c:COM
								NOT = { is_country_type = decentralized } # if Comanche is recognized, then they get a more formal name

							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_revolution
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_secession

							OR = {
								NAND = {
									exists = c:GBR
									c:GBR = {
										has_diplomatic_pact = {
											who = scope:actor
											type = dominion
											is_initiator = yes
										}
									}
								}
								NAND = {
									exists = c:HBC
									scope:actor = {
										is_subject_of = c:HBC
									}
								}

									exists = c:CAN

								is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_secession

				AND = {
					exists = c:PWN
					OR = {
						this = c:PWN
						any_diplomatic_play = {
							initiator = root
							target = c:PWN
							OR = {
								is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_revolution
								is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_secession
							}
						}
					}
				}
				AND = {
					exists = c:BLF
					OR = {
						this = c:BLF
						any_diplomatic_play = {
							initiator = root
							target = c:BLF
							OR = {
								is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_revolution
								is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_secession
							}
						}
					}
				}
				AND = {
					exists = c:ZIM
					OR = {
						this = c:ZIM
						any_diplomatic_play = {
							initiator = root
							target = c:ZIM
							OR = {
								is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_revolution
								is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_secession
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					AND = {
						exists = c:USA
						this = c:USA
						c:USA = {
							any_scope_state = {
								state_region = { has_variable = district_of_columbia }
								count > 0
							}
							any_scope_state = {
								state_region = { NOT = { has_variable = district_of_columbia } }
								count < 1
							}
						}
					}
					any_diplomatic_play = {
						initiator = root
						target = {
							AND = {
								exists = c:USA
								this = c:USA
								c:USA = {
									any_scope_state = {
										state_region = { has_variable = district_of_columbia }
										count > 0
									}
									any_scope_state = {
										state_region = { NOT = { has_variable = district_of_columbia } }
										count < 1
									}
								}
							}
						}
						OR = {
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_revolution
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_secession
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					AND = {
						exists = c:USA
						this = c:USA
						coa_communist_trigger = yes
					}
					any_diplomatic_play = {
						initiator = root
						target = {
							AND = {
								exists = c:USA
								this = c:USA
								coa_communist_trigger = yes
							}
						}
						OR = {
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_revolution
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_secession
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					AND = {
						exists = c:USA
						this = c:USA
						coa_theocracy_trigger = yes
					}
					any_diplomatic_play = {
						initiator = root
						target = {
							AND = {
								exists = c:USA
								this = c:USA
								coa_theocracy_trigger = yes
							}
						}
						OR = {
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_revolution
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_secession
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					AND = {
						exists = c:USA
						this = c:USA
						coa_monarchy_trigger = yes
					}
					any_diplomatic_play = {
						initiator = root
						target = {
							AND = {
								exists = c:USA
								this = c:USA
								coa_monarchy_trigger = yes
							}
						}
						OR = {
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_revolution
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_secession
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					AND = {
						exists = c:CSA
						this = c:CSA
						coa_monarchy_trigger = yes
					}
					any_diplomatic_play = {
						initiator = root
						target = {
							AND = {
								exists = c:CSA
								this = c:CSA
								coa_monarchy_trigger = yes
							}
						}
						OR = {
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_revolution
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_secession
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					AND = {
						exists = c:CSA
						this = c:CSA
						coa_communist_trigger = yes
					}
					any_diplomatic_play = {
						initiator = root
						target = {
							AND = {
								exists = c:CSA
								this = c:CSA
								coa_communist_trigger = yes
							}
						}
						OR = {
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_revolution
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_secession
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					AND = {
						exists = c:USA
						this = c:USA
						coa_theocracy_trigger = yes
					}
					any_diplomatic_play = {
						initiator = root
						target = {
							AND = {
								exists = c:USA
								this = c:USA
								coa_theocracy_trigger = yes
							}
						}
						OR = {
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_revolution
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_secession
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					AND = {
						exists = c:USA
						this = c:USA
						NOT = {
							c:USA = {		
								any_scope_state = {
									state_region = { NOT = { has_variable = district_of_columbia } }
									count = 1
								}
							}
						}
					}
					any_diplomatic_play = {
						initiator = root
						target = {
							AND = {
								exists = c:USA
								this = c:USA
								NOT = {
									c:USA = {		
										any_scope_state = {
											state_region = { NOT = { has_variable = district_of_columbia } }
											count = 1
										}
									}
								}
							}
						}
						OR = {
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_revolution
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_secession
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					AND = {
						exists = c:NET
						this = c:NET
						c:NET = { 
							owns_entire_state_region = STATE_FLANDERS
							owns_entire_state_region = STATE_WALLONIA
						}
					}
					any_diplomatic_play = {
						initiator = root
						target = {
							AND = {
								exists = c:NET
								this = c:NET
								c:NET = { 
									owns_entire_state_region = STATE_FLANDERS
									owns_entire_state_region = STATE_WALLONIA
								}
							}
						}
						OR = {
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_revolution
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_secession
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					AND = {
						exists = c:BEL
						this = c:BEL
						coa_republic_trigger = yes
						NOT = { coa_communist_trigger = yes }
					}
					any_diplomatic_play = {
						initiator = root
						target = {
							AND = {
								exists = c:BEL
								this = c:BEL
								coa_republic_trigger = yes
								NOT = { coa_communist_trigger = yes }
							}
						}
						OR = {
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_revolution
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_secession
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					AND = {
						exists = c:PHI
						this = c:PHI
						exists = c:SPA
						c:SPA = {
							has_diplomatic_pact = {
								who = c:PHI
								type = puppet
								is_initiator = yes
							}
						}
					}
					any_diplomatic_play = {
						initiator = root
						target = {
							AND = {
								exists = c:PHI
								this = c:PHI
								exists = c:SPA
								c:SPA = {
									has_diplomatic_pact = {
										who = c:PHI
										type = puppet
										is_initiator = yes
									}
								}
							}
						}
						OR = {
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_revolution
							is_diplomatic_play_type = dp_secession
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		localization_key = RU_CL_END_UT # -ют
	}
	text = {
		localization_key = RU_CL_END_T_DEFAULT # -ет
	}
}
